name: Thief Movement Timing
description: Testing thief NPC movement patterns and timing using debug commands

entries.expectedOutput:
Round Room
This is a circular stone room with passages in all directions. Several of them have unfortunately been blocked by cave-ins.
There is a suspicious-looking individual, holding a large bag, leaning against one wall. He is armed with a deadly stiletto.
The thief contains:
  A stiletto
  A large bag
entries.notes: Thief should be visible in starting room
Move away so thief becomes invisible and can move
Advance one turn - thief should move
Move to where thief should be after one move

entries.expectedOutput:
Cyclops Room
This room has an exit on the northwest and a staircase leading up.
A cyclops, who looks prepared to eat horses (much less mere adventurers), blocks the staircase. In his hand he carries a large, heavy sword.
There is a suspicious-looking individual, holding a large bag, leaning against one wall. He is armed with a deadly stiletto.
The thief contains:
  A stiletto
  A large bag
entries.notes: Thief should now be visible in cyclops room

entries.expectedOutput:
